room_title: Escape room "Disarmed" by Exit Strategies in Redding
room_description:
In this scenario, your team must locate and disarm a powerful bomb set to go off in exactly one hour. You begin by scouring the bomberâ€™s bedroom for clues to various puzzles that, if correctly solved, will ultimately lead you and your team to the necessary information.
The would-be bomber is quite devious so be very careful. A misstep will likely lead to premature detonation and extreme loss of life.
